title.label: ‚ÄòNo Ads‚Äô doesn‚Äôt mean you won‚Äôt see ads

content.label:
I enjoy the gameplay in this. When I play a game I don‚Äôt want to be interrupted by advertising. If you want money from me, just ask. If I‚Äôve had a chance to try the game and I like it (and ads are perfectly appropriate for that) I‚Äôll happily cough up the cash. If you pay the $.99 to remove ads in this game (and many others), you don‚Äôt remove the ads. You remove SOME ads. Your game flow will continue to be interrupted by ads indirectly. You won‚Äôt SEE the ad unless you click the button to continue the round , but you DO have to wait while a timer expires. I‚Äôll happily give up the option to continue a round to just ‚Äî you know ‚Äî play the game.  Extending a round which seldom works anyway because you‚Äôre out of the flow because of the ad. That it‚Äôs held out as an inducement is more about the game playing you than you playing the game. $.99 isn‚Äôt enough to compensate the programming time?  Fine. Charge more. I make stuff too.  I like to be paid. I‚Äôm not against it. But remember:  You‚Äôre not curing cancer here. There are literally millions of other choices. As much as I enjoy the gameplay in your games, I‚Äôm not going to be a lab rat. Enjoy the $.99. It‚Äôs the last you get. $2.99 and really removing ads would have assured you of a customer for life. That $.99 was an inexpensive lesson on who to avoid. And to uninstall. 

The world is annoying enough. I don‚Äôt need to pay money to be annoyed by ads. That‚Äôs why I play games. Why you write them is your business. 

For the record Apple shouldn‚Äôt allow this. But they will.
I paid to not see the ads and I‚Äôm still seeing ads I call BS in this app
It‚Äôs great game when you are actually able to play the game. All the app has been doing for me recently is crash. Please fix this!

title.label: It glitches when no WiFi access

content.label: This game is an amazing game, I have no problem with levels (even though some may be a bit too difficult but it‚Äôs ok), but the one true issue I have is that I can play the game If I don‚Äôt have any internet access.... idk if it‚Äôs meant that way, but I always like to play games that I have in my phone when I have no WiFi‚Äôs access or just to pass the time. Each time I‚Äôd go into the game(when having no WiFi), it bring up the beginning screen, then it‚Äôll glitch out, taking me back to my home page on my phone. Why?
